DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study is to determine if the use of structured testing, which is a blood glucose monitoring, via the Accu-Chek 360Â° View blood glucose analysis tool has a positive effect on the subjects overall glycemic control.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Improvement of Blood Glucose Control in Patients With Diabetes Type 2 Using SMBG
DOC.criteria: 1. Age:= and >20 years. 2. Intend to paticipate in this study after education of structured testing. 3.HbA1c:= and >7.5% in the recect 2 months. 1.Pregancy. 2. Heavy complication 3. judged unsuitable by doctor
